history.narrative: Law 7-93 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-324, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 8, 1987 and January 5, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 25, 1988, it was assigned Act No. 7-135 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
